sourcesContent:
import { Component, inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TemplateService } from '../../services/template.service'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-template-item', templateUrl: './template-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./template-item.component.css'] }) export class TemplateItemComponent implements OnInit { _TemplateService=inject(TemplateService); _router=inject(ActivatedRoute); templateData: any = {}; templateId!: string; ngOnInit(): void { this.templateId = this._router.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')!; this.getTemplatebyId(); } getTemplatebyId(){ this._TemplateService.getTemplateById(this.templateId).subscribe({ next: (res) => { console.log( 'Template id',this.templateId); console.log('Result =' ,res); this.templateData = res; }, error: (error) => { console.error('Error:', error); } }) } toggleSection(section: any): void { section.expanded = !section.expanded; } toggleField(field: any): void { field.expanded = !field.expanded; } addSection(): void { const newSection = { title: '', type: 'form', fields: [], expanded: false }; this.templateData.sections.push(newSection); } }
{{ template.title }}
{{ template.uniqeCode }}

{{ section.title }}

Type: {{ section.type }}

{{ field.title }}

Type: {{ field.type }}

Required: {{ field.isRequired ? 'Yes' : 'No' }}

Field Details...
{{ params.controls['id'].value ? 'Edit Template' : 'Add Template' }}
{{ sectionParams.controls['id'].value ? 'Edit Section' : 'Add Section' }}
{{ fieldParams.controls['id'].value ? 'Edit Field' : 'Add Field' }}
